environment_overview:
1) Two Samsung TVs have been detected: the Samsung 8 Series (82) and the Samsung The Frame (49). The Samsung 8 Series is identified by the ID 8e20883f-c444-4edf-86bf-64e74c1d70e2 and supports capabilities such as switching, audio volume control, audio mute, and channel management. The Samsung The Frame, with ID 415228e4-456c-44b1-8602-70f98c67fba8, has similar capabilities but also supports multiple input sources, including HDMI.

2) The current state of the Samsung 8 Series TV indicates it is tuned to channel 7 and is capable of being turned off. The Samsung The Frame TV currently has no channel set. Both TVs support power control via the switch capability, and the Samsung 8 Series can be turned off while the channel can be set on the Samsung The Frame. The Samsung The Frame is currently using the HDMI4 input source.
